SBS.CO.summary: Scandinavian Brake Systems A/S, together with its subsidiaries, sources, completes, stocks, markets, and distributes spare parts for cars and vans in Europe and internationally. The company offers various wear parts for automotive aftermarket, including mechanical and hydraulic brake parts; steering parts and wheel bearing kits; suspension and transmission parts; clutch parts; starters and alternators; and brake discs, brake drums, brake callipers, and brake shoes under the NK and Eurobrake brands, as well as private labels. It serves international, national, and local distributors, including capital chains, purchasing groups independent distributors, and e-commerce platforms. The company was formerly known as OBTEC and changed its name to Scandinavian Brake Systems A/S in 2003. Scandinavian Brake Systems A/S was founded in 1964 and is based in Svendborg, Denmark. Scandinavian Brake Systems A/S is a subsidiary of Stiholt Holding A/S.
